locations.title: River Cities Fuel Plaza
locations.content: River Cities Fuel Plaza may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: I'm a truck driver, I took my 34 reset here. Nice, quiet area. Convenient store/restaurant combo; clean with friendly people. Good was great, service was even better. Waitress recommended taking a taxi to the Ann Arbor Lighthouse is the weather was better. Will definitely stop here again when I'm in the area.

showerReviews.reviewText: Don't know if it's a lack of cleaning or lack of use, but the dust bunnies in shower 1 will talk to you. Big dirt lot. With the shape of the restrooms and showers I'm not willing to chance eating here so I can't really comment on the food.

Nice truck stop, not many rigs here, plenty of space available, RVs appear to be welcome. Nice showers with hot water, great water pressure (used the handicap one).  Towels provided. Shower was $13 and they give $5 back when you return the …
$15 for a shower and then when you’re done they give you five dollars back and the laundry is cheap
Shower curtains need to be changed shower walls need more cleaning has a restaurant lots of parking but it's dirt

gr8Stop friendly staff GoOoOd food

didn't fuel or shower. cold1sinthevooler

eZ in and out if ur headed east n2b west ethr

Thank you so very much for allowing a fellow driver buy a very nice shower on her way too a party!!!  I sure wish you would've been built when we were driving way back, but now you are a welcomed stop for a break, good food, and maybe …

The staff I met was friendly, the place was clean. The wife and I are on a road trip and needed a place to wash clothes, eat and shower and they had all of the above. Food, ice cream, trailer parking, showers, coin operated laundromat, …

showerReviews.reviewText: … We spent the night in the RV lot after seeking shelter from dangerous winds & possible severe t-storms. We were able to do laundry & shower,  All very clean.  The laundry was very clean & reasonably priced... would definitely recommend! A …

… has many hidden amenities.  A great place for everyone but especially for truckers, and long haulers, as they have laundry and shower facilities as well as a dentist, barber, work out facilities and so much more! We love stopping on our …

… entertainment. There’s a huge convenience store for your snack needs and a diner that serves both menu items and a buffet. Didn’t get a shower there but the restrooms were clean. The place has 3 floors that includes a barber. There’s also …

Pretty big with lots to do. Has a shower area. Tons of restaurants. Stuff for kids to explore and see. Has a chiropractor on site. This place has leveled up in the last few years by adding tons of stuff. …

Hadn't been here in years. Went to take a shower on Palm Sunday and Pastor Daryl was giving a sermon in the lounge in front of the showers. The Lord told me to stay. Was warm & friendly service. Then I met with the pastor for 4 hours that …

… of necessities and snacks. Spend some time wandering around the main store area, there's plenty to see. Clean restrooms and shower. Navigate through the various gift shops located throughout the facility. You can also get customized …

World’s biggest truck stop. Besides truck parking which can park 900 trucks you have a restaurant, theatre, shower rooms, lounge, convince stores. Its is spread in 75 acres. If I am not wrong you can park here for free. It has fuel station …

This place is huge. There’s a food court inside the truck stop. Upstairs there are dentist, chiropractor, shower, laundry, hair salon. And the truck section of stuff takes up half of the place. Parking was no problem. There’s also tesla …
… You can take a shower, get a haircut, and watch a movie. There's even a dentist and a chiropractor. …

… and friendly service here you can buy too much trick stuff from here lights bumper fittings hoses etc. little price higher Coustmer service very good here i love this location shower also very clean and too much like more than 25 may be

showerReviews.reviewText: This truck stop is very NASTY shower disgusting not clean and the argue with you that they just cleaned them if this is clean, I would hate to see your house utterly disgusting. Look at the photos hairs and corn pads in the shower toilet …

… Here if you buy diesel, you'll get free parking. If you spend $25 inside, you'll get free parking. If you buy shower you get free parking. The staff is nice and they have good variety of products inside. I wish they were all like this. Dri …

New owners so now they charge for parking. I think it’s $15.00. I bought a $12.00 shower and got the parking for free. Nice shower. I would suggest bring your own towels. Lots of good near by walking distance. Workers there are really nice.
$12 for shower with towels, grab what you need from the rack by the counter. …

… for truck stops aren’t very high. This is a decent place to rest at. They have a large lot, a McDonald’s AND a subway… showers (for 10$) which is a great price. They also have laundry two washers and two dryers. (1.50 to dry and 1.50 to …
Holes in parking lot are big enough for a semi to get swallowed up. Shower rooms very hot had to dress in the hallway to cool off

Just took a shower at this facility. It was not by choice. It is definitely an old facility but the moment I walked in the door I could tell that the staff here really tried to do their best to give everyone a great experience there is a …
Great staff and friendly atmosphere. Easy in and out it’s $15 for overnight parking or free with shower or $25 inside purchase.

2 stars only because the staff was nice to deal with.
Washroom/ shower was dirty. If I wasn't dirty, I'd have been after leaving.
Not much in food...McDonald's or Subway.
A few other choices across the street.

Not bad , fuel price is good , you have to leave $5 deposit for ur shower till u bring ur towel back to them , shower is not really comfortable but is ok for quick shower , driver waiting room old need update , they have McDonald’s there …

showerReviews.reviewText: 15$ per person for a shower ? Is that normal out here? Quality inn is down the street for 66$ for a room .. tacobell was refreshing to see..
I was told that truck Driver's can only shower up till 9pm but can shower in the morning from 5 am till 9 PM it's 545am and the store is still not open .
